Articles.Content: Can someone tell me how to rescue an EVA in orbit of Kerbin in career mode? It's a contract I got.
Well, you could always try searching for the answer ... it should be around, the question pops up every day or two. Who knows, it might even be worth putting it in a sticky regarding doing contracts!

No need to tease the new players. Kryxal is referring to this post: http://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/threads/87518-21-Jul-KSP-First-Contract-%28v0-24%29-Frequently-Asked-Questions

It's stickied near the top of this forum. You should try to look through all the stickied posts in each forum you visit.

SpaceCannon,

You know how you just don't realize it.

You need to cycle through your playable craft using '[' or ']'.

Once you have the Kerbal to be rescued selected.

Move them to the craft; then 'F' (grab), ;'F' (enter).

Last step is the most important ... return home safely.

Edited August 5, 2014 by TranceaddicT
ninja'd by a master ... MasterTao
Thanks to all of you, I'll try these later.
The funny thing is, I didn't notice that that WAS there ... I thought it was a good idea, clearly somebody else thought so too, and some time ago.
Don't forget to hit "R" to activate the rescuee's jetpack.
